tika-s0305t0:4_2: Avijjā hi aññāṇalakkhaṇā sammuyhanākārena ārammaṇe pavattatīti sampayuttadhammānampi tadākārānuvidhānatāya paccayo hoti.
tika-s0305t0:4_3: Tathā hi te aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāvepi dhamme niccādito gaṇhanti,
tika-s0305t0:4_5: Yaṃ pana mohena abhibhūto pāpakiriyāya ādīnavaṃ apassanto pāṇaṃ hanati,
tika-s0305t0:4_10: ayamassa sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena ca pubbaṅgamatā.
tika-s0305t0:4_14: Sā panesā vuttākārena akusalānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhūtā avijjā uppajjatīti sambandho.
tika-s0305t0:4_15: Yadetanti yaṃ etaṃ pāpājigucchanatāya pāpato alajjanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ ahirikaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:4_20: Ettha avijjāya vuttanayānusārena tappaṭipakkhato ca attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t0:4_22: tattha yathā akusalakammapathavasena pavattiyaṃ pubbaṅgamatā avijjāya,
tika-s0305t0:4_23: evaṃ kusalakammapathavasena puññakiriyavatthuvasena ca pavattiyaṃ vijjāya pubbaṅgamatā vattabbā.
tika-s0305t0:4_24: Vīmaṃsādhipativasena pavattiyaṃ ādhipaccākāravasena ca pubbaṅgamatā veditabbā.
tika-s0305t0:4_25: Dvīhevāti ca avadhāraṇaṃ ādhipaccākārassa sahajāteneva saṅgahetabbato.
tika-s0305t0:5_7: Sammādiṭṭhi pahotīti ettha sā vijjā sammādiṭṭhi veditabbā.
tika-s0305t0:5_8: Na ekato sabbāni labbhanti sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhārassa anekarūpattā.
tika-s0305t0:5_9: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe ekato labbhanti kiccato bhinnānampi tāsaṃ tattha sarūpato abhinnattā.
tika-s0305t0:5_10: Ekā eva hi virati maggakkhaṇe tissannampi viratīnaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati,
tika-s0305t0:5_11: yathā ekā eva sammādiṭṭhi parijānanādivasena catubbidhakiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati.
tika-s0305t0:5_12: Tāni ca kho sabbāni aṭṭhapi paṭhamajjhānike magge labbhantīti yojanā.
tika-s0305t0:6_1: Yasmā mahāsaḷāyatanasutte vuttaṃ “sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ eva aṅgānaṃ vasenā”ti,
tika-s0305t0:6_3: “Pubbeva kho panā”ti hi vacanaṃ tadā maggakkhaṇe viratīnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñāpeti,
tika-s0305t0:6_4: tasmā kāmāvacaracittesu viya lokuttaracittesu virati aniyatāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t0:7_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā abhidhamme maggavibhaṅge pañcaṅgikavāro āgatoti āha “yampi abhidhamme”tiādi.
tika-s0305t0:7_2: “Ekaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ vutta”nti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “yasmiñhi kāle”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:7_5: Viratiuppādanena micchāvācādīni puggalena maggasamaye pajahāpentīti sammādiṭṭhiādīni “pañca kārakaṅgānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0305t0:8_0: Sammākammanto pūratīti imehi sammādiṭṭhiādīhi sammākammantakiccaṃ pūrati nāma tehi vīriyādikehi tadatthasiddhito.
tika-s0305t0:8_2: Imaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetunti lokuttaramaggakkhaṇepi imāneva pañca sammāvācādiviratittayassa ekakkhaṇe kārāpakaṅgānīti dassetuṃ.
tika-s0305t0:8_3: Evaṃ vuttanti “tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:8_12: tappaccayā akusalā ca dasāti vīsati akusalapakkhiyā,
tika-s0305t0:8_14: tappaccayā kusalā ca dasāti vīsati kusalapakkhiyā mahācattārīsakasutte vuttā.
tika-s0305t0:9_0: Yasmā kosalasaṃyuttepi idha ca therena “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0305t0:9_1: brahmacariyassā”tiādinā vuttaṃ “mā hevaṃ ānandā”tiādinā paṭikkhipitvā “sakalamevidaṃ ānandā”tiādinā bhagavatā desitaṃ suttaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-s0305t0:12_3: taṃ pana dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tatthapi dhammasenāpatino eva savisesaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:12_7: Tasmā tassa matthakappattiyā maggabrahmacariye ijjhante tassa ekadeso idha ijjhati,
tika-s0305t0:12_13: taṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāriko nāññāsi ñāṇassa sāvakavisayepi sappadesikattā,

tika-s0305t0:16_1: Ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karotīti idaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare ṭhitena kātabbaṃ cārittaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:16_2: Nagarato na pakkantāti nagarato bahi na gatā.
tika-s0305t0:17_4: Rāgaṃ vinayamānā pariyosāpetīti sabbampi rāgaṃ samucchedavinayavasena vineti,
tika-s0305t0:17_6: Kiccapariyosāpaneneva hi sayampi pariyosānaṃ nipphattiṃ upagacchati.
tika-s0305t0:18_4: evaṃ kiriyāvasena laddhabalena tatramajjhattatāyuge thiraṃ dhāreti,
tika-s0305t0:18_6: Hiriggahaṇena cettha taṃsahacaraṇato ottappampi gahitaṃyeva hoti.
tika-s0305t0:18_8: Nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ minātīti mano.
tika-s0305t0:18_12: Lokiyavipassanācittaṃ atirekapaññāsa kusaladhamme ekābaddhe ekasaṅgahite karotīti sambandho.
tika-s0305t0:18_14: avikkhepo hotī”ti cittaṅgavasena dhammasaṅgahe āgatanayeneva veditabbā.
tika-s0305t0:18_16: Atirekasaṭṭhīti te eva sammākammantājīvehi anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīhi ca saddhiṃ atirekasaṭṭhi kusaladhamme.
tika-s0305t0:19_0: Ariyapuggalassa nibbānaṃ paṭimukhaṃ sampāpane ratho viyāti ratho.
tika-s0305t0:19_6: Vipassanāsampayuttānanti lokiyāya lokuttarāya ca vipassanāya sampayuttānaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:19_13: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā dhurasamādhisaddānaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t0:20_9: Na naṃ te vijjhantīti vacanapathā na naṃ vijjhanti.
tika-s0305t0:20_11: tassa ariyamaggassa rathassa sammā yojitassa antarā bhaṅgo natthīti attho.
tika-s0305t0:21_0: Attano purisakāraṃ nissāya laddhattā attano santāneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t0:21_4: Dhitisampannatāya dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā lokamhā niyyanti gacchanti.
tika-s0305t0:21_5: “Jayaṃ jaya”nti gāthāyaṃ vacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “jinantā jinantā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:24_3: aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭikkhipati ito aññassa niyyānikamaggassa abhāvato.

tika-s0305t0:24_7: Ayaṃ pana viseso “rāgakkhayo”tiādīhi yadipi nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:27_1: Rāgavinayādipadehi nibbānaṃ vāpi vucceyya arahattaṃ vāpi.
tika-s0305t0:27_3: tasmā bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayavasena “nibbānadhātuyā kho eta”ntiādinā nibbānadhātuṃ vissajjetvā puna “āsavānaṃ khayo tena vuccatī”ti āha.
tika-s0305t0:27_8: Anusandhikusalatāya pucchanto etaṃ avocāti iminā “pucchānusandhi idha labbhatī”ti dīpitaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:30_1: Ekena pariyāyena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ vibhajitvāti “sammādiṭṭhī”tiādinā ekena pariyāyena ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ vibhāgena dassetvā “katamā ca,
tika-s0305t0:30_4: Uggahadhāraṇaparicayañāṇānipi savanañāṇe eva avarodhaṃ gacchantīti “savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:31_2: Iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpanti nirodhamaggesu ninnabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0305t0:31_4: tanninnabhāvo eva ca tattha kammakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:31_6: so eva abhimukhabhāvo tesaṃ samāgamoti ekābhisamayo.
tika-s0305t0:32_2: Ettha ca keci “lokiyañāṇampi paṭivedho sabbassa yāthāvabodhabhāvato”ti vadanti.
tika-s0305t0:32_4: na ca so lokuttaroti? Taṃ na,
tika-s0305t0:32_7: paṭivedhanimittattā vā uggahādivasena pavattaṃ dukkhādīsu pubbabhāge ñāṇaṃ “paṭivedho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0305t0:32_9: paṭivedhabhūtameva pana ñāṇaṃ ujukaṃ paṭivedhoti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0305t0:33_0: Duddasattāti anadhigatañāṇena yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā uppattito pākaṭānipi.
tika-s0305t0:33_5: Tassa mahantatarassa icchitabbataṃ dukkarataratañca upamāhi dasseti “bhavaggaggahaṇattha”ntiādinā.
tika-s0305t0:33_6: Yathā purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ viya kenaci pariyāyena apākaṭatāya paramagambhīrattā uggahādivasena pubbabhāge
tika-s0305t0:33_7: pavattibhedaṃ gahetvā “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādinā catubbidhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:33_8: Ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti ekābhisamayavaseneva pavattanato.
tika-s0305t0:34_2: Kāmaṃ sammasantassāti duvidhampi kāmaṃ aniccādito sammasantassa.
tika-s0305t0:34_9: So eva ca nesaṃ anto samucchedaviveketi katvā tasmiṃ sādhetabbe uppannoti vuttaṃ “kāmavivittante uppanno”ti.
tika-s0305t0:34_12: Imasmiñca nekkhammasaṅkappassa saddatthavibhāvena yathāvutto kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhādiko atthaniddhāraṇaviseso antogadho.
tika-s0305t0:35_0: Eseva nayoti iminā byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhena vihiṃsāya paccanīkaṭṭhenātiādikaṃ abyāpādāvihiṃsāsaṅkappānaṃ atthuddhāraṇavidhiṃ atidisati.
tika-s0305t0:36_1: Pabbajitānaṃ micchājīvo nāma āhāranimittakoti āha “khādanīyabhojanīyādīnaṃ atthāyā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:36_2: Sabbaso anesanāya pahānaṃ sammāājīvoti āha “buddhappasatthena ājīvenā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:36_4: Akammapathapattāya hi anesanāya so padaghātaṃ karotiyeva.
tika-s0305t0:37_0: Tathārūpe vā ārammaṇeti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe imassa pubbe kilesā na uppannā,
tika-s0305t0:37_5: Vīriyameva pana anuppannākusalānuppādane labbhamānachandatāya dhurasampaggahatāya chandapariyāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:37_8: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karoti.

tika-s0305t0:39_13: itarassa ca atabbhāvato tīsupi vādesu vipassanāva niyametīti veditabbo,
tika-s0305t0:39_14: tasmā vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamavādepi apādakajjhānādipādakāpi maggā paṭhamajjhānikā honti.

tika-s0305t0:39_21: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana visuddhimaggassa etissā aṭṭhakathāya ekasaṅgahitattā “tesaṃ vādavinicchayo…pe…
tika-s0305t0:42_2: So hi nikantakasadiso paṭimukhagataṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindati,

tika-s0305t0:50_10: tasmā bhagavato aññabhūmikāpi vedanā aññabhūmikānaṃ sattānaṃ viruddhā uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ “yāva bhavaggā pavattā sukhā vedanā”ti.

tika-s0305t0:51_5: pariggahetvā taṃ sammasitvā anukkamena samāpannā jhānasamāpatti phalasamāpatti ca.

tika-s0305t0:64_9: Ñāṇassa micchāsabhāvo nāma natthīti viññāṇamevettha paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattaṃ ñāṇa-
tika-s0305t0:64_11: Micchāpaccavekkhaṇoti kiñci pāpaṃ katvā “aho mayā kataṃ sukata”nti evaṃ pavatto micchāpaccavekkhaṇo.
tika-s0305t0:64_12: Gosīlagovatādipūraṇaṃ muttīti evaṃ gaṇhato micchāvimutti nāma.
tika-s0305t0:64_32: Sahajātavasena upanissayavasena ca sapaccayatā kiccasādhane nipphādane sahāyabhāvūpagamane ca saparivāratā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0305t0:68_2: Ekantakāḷakattā cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇato kaṇhābhijātihetuto ca vuttaṃ “kaṇhanti akusaladhamma”nti.
tika-s0305t0:68_3: Vodānabhāvato cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇato sukkābhijātihetuto ca vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t0:69_3: tena araṇīyato upagantabbato sāmaññattho nibbānanti āha –
tika-s0305t0:69_6: Brahmaññatthanti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t0:72_1: Aparāparaṃ parivattamānena vattasampannena saṃsāraddhānapariññāvaseneva nibbānassa pattabbattā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t0:72_8: Tasmāti yasmā apariññeyyaparijānanakiccena nibbānassa pattiyā addhānapariññāsiddhi ñāyati,
tika-s0305t0:72_9: tasmā upacāravasena nibbānaṃ “addhānapariññā”ti vuccati yathā “himasanti sūriyaṃ uggametī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:72_14: Yāthāvato jānanato paccakkhato dassanato ca ñāṇadassananti idha phalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇā adhippetāti āha –
tika-s0305t0:75_2: evaṃ kalyāṇamittatā ariyamaggapātubhāvassāti sadisūpamā aruṇuggaṃ kalyāṇamittatāya.
tika-s0305t0:75_4: ariyamaggo vā daṭṭhabbo sūriyapātubhāvo viya tena vidhūpanīyandhakāravidhamanato.
tika-s0305t0:78_1: Tathā tathā vutte bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena kathito,
tika-s0305t0:82_2: ime kusalā dhammā uppādetabbā”ti vuttavajjetabbavajjanasampādetabbasampādanavasena pavatto appamādo.
tika-s0305t0:88_1: Vassikāya pupphaṃ vassikaṃ yathā “āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka”nti.
tika-s0305t0:88_3: “Yāni kānicī”ti padehi itarāni samānādhikaraṇāni bhavituṃ yuttānīti “paccatte sāmivacana”nti vatvā tathā vibhattivipariṇāmo kato.
tika-s0305t0:88_4: “Tantāvutāna”nti padaṃ niddhāraṇe sāmivacananti tattha “vatthānī”ti vacanasesena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:93_2: Ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ magganti ettha nānantariyakatāya vipassanāpi gahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “sahavipassana”nti.
tika-s0305t0:97_2: Taṃ pana nāgānaṃ balappatti evāti āha –
tika-s0305t0:97_5: Nāgā kāyaṃ vaḍḍhentītiādi yasmā ca bhagavatā upamāvasena ābhataṃ,
tika-s0305t0:97_6: tasmā evameva khoti etthātiādinā upamaṃ saṃsandati.
tika-s0305t0:99_1: Na patiāvamatīti ca nikujjitabhāvena udakavamano ghaṭo,
tika-s0305t0:101_1: Tenetaṃ vuttanti tena ariyamaggassa ijjhanena etesaṃ sabbesaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:105_1: Sahavipassanassa ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya ijjhanena etaṃ abhiññāpariññeyyādidhammānaṃ abhiññāparijānanādīnaṃ
tika-s0305t0:105_2: ijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ khattiyādīnaṃ visayaādikaṃ karontassa kathāya sajjitattā.
tika-s0305t0:109_2: Kilesakāmopi hi kāmitanti parikappitena vidhinā ca adhikarāgehi esanīyo.
tika-s0305t0:115_2: Rūpārūpabhaveti rūpabhave ca arūpabhave ca rūpārūpataṇhopanissayā rūpārūpāvacarakammanibbattā khandhā.
tika-s0305t0:117_4: Ghaṭanapabandhanakilesoti hetunā phalassa kammavaṭṭassa vipākavaṭṭena dukkhappabandhasaññitassa ghaṭanassa sambajjhanassa nibbattakakileso.
tika-s0305t0:120_2: Thāmagatanti ca aññehi asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t0:120_4: So sati paccayalābhe uppajjanārahatāya santāne anusetīti anusayo.
tika-s0305t0:120_7: Tattha pavattiyā paccayabhāvato orambhāgiyāni yathā “pacchiyo goduhako”ti.
tika-s0305t0:120_11: tassa hitānīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā na vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t0:127_0: Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
tika-s0305t0:127_1: Kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahatīti etena sikhāpattavipassanāsahagatānampi satiādīnaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:127_3: Sattahi bojjhaṅgehi bhāvitehi saccapaṭivedho hotīti kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yathāhā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t0:127_4: Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyāti etena bodhibojjhaṅgasaddānaṃ samudāyāvayavavisayataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:127_5: Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyāti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:128_2: bodhiyā eva aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ “bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:128_3: Vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānaṃ saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ paccakkhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ aviparītaṃ sammā
tika-s0305t0:128_4: bujjhantīti evaṃ vatthuvisesadīpakehi uparimaggehi anubujjhantītiādinā vuttabodhisaddehi nippadesena
tika-s0305t0:129_2: Punadeva sundaro ca atthopīti āha “pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo”ti.
tika-s0305t0:129_4: “Eke vaṇṇayantī”ti vatvā tattha yathāvuttavivekattayato aññaṃ vivekadvayaṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ “te hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:129_8: Tattha tattha nicchayatāya kasiṇajjhānaggahaṇena anuppādānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:132_2: Kammautucittāhārasaññito catubbidho paccayo ṭhiti etassāti paccayaṭṭhitiko.
tika-s0305t0:132_6: Tena kāraṇena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā subhanimittanti.
tika-s0305t0:132_9: iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇampi subhanimittaṃ vuttākārena.
tika-s0305t0:132_12: Tasminti yathāniddhārite kāmacchandabhūte tadārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte.
tika-s0305t0:132_16: saddena kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa āhāradassanapāḷi uttānāti katvā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t0:133_0: Paṭighopi paṭighanimittaṃ purimuppannassa pacchā uppajjanakassa nimittabhāvato.
tika-s0305t0:134_12: Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyālasiyaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:135_7: Paṇamanāti yathā hi tantato uṭṭhitapesakāro kiñcideva upariṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ ussāpeti,
tika-s0305t0:135_10: Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyaphandanameva kathitaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:136_6: Kucchipūraṃ bhuttavato hi pariḷāhuppattiyā upahatindriyo viya hoti,
tika-s0305t0:137_7: Iriyāpathikampi cittaṃ yassa vasena iriyāpathaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto olīyati,
tika-s0305t0:138_0: Cetaso avūpasamoti cittassa avūpasantatā asannisinnabhāvo. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:138_2: Atthato panetanti svāyaṃ avūpasantākāro vikkhepasabhāvattā vikkhepahetutāya ca atthato etaṃ uddhaccakukkuccameva.
tika-s0305t0:139_0: Vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā nāma “buddhe kaṅkhatī”tiādinā āgataaṭṭhakaṅkhāvatthubhūtā dhammā.
tika-s0305t0:139_1: Yasmā vicikicchā byāpādādayo viya anu anu uggahaṇapaccayā uppajjati,
tika-s0305t0:139_3: Yasmā purimuppannā vicikicchā pacchā vicikicchāya paccayo hoti,
tika-s0305t0:139_8: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ārammaṇassapi tattha visesapaccayataṃ upādāya “kāmacchando vicikicchāti ime dve dhammā ārammaṇena kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:139_10: tathāpi yathā “paṭighampi paṭighanimitta”nti katvā “byāpādo upanissayena kathito”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:139_11: evaṃ subhampi subhanimittanti katvā kāmacchando upanissayena kathitoti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0305t0:139_15: Ubhayesampi upanissayakoṭiyā paccayabhāve vattabbameva natthīti āha “sahajātena ca upanissayena cā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:140_0: Yasmā sati nāma “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anussaraṇavasena vattati,
tika-s0305t0:140_2: Lokuttaradhamme ca anussavādivasena gahetvā tathā pavattateva.
tika-s0305t0:141_3: Padadvayena paccayato sabhāvato kiccato phalato kusaladhammaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:142_0: Kusalakiriyāya ādikammabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ dhitisabhāvatāya dhātūti vuttanti āha “ārambhadhātūti paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti.
tika-s0305t0:142_1: Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:142_3: Adhimattādhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthaṃ paṭupaṭutarādibhāvappattaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:142_4: “parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanatāya tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0305t0:143_3: Yasmā aparāparuppattiyā pītipi tathā vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “pītiyā eva taṃ nāma”nti.
tika-s0305t0:143_6: kāyapassaddhiyā vedanādikhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassapi passambhanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t0:143_8: tato evettha bhagavatā lahutādīnaṃ viya duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t0:143_9: Tathā samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno samathova samathanimittaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:143_12: Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vutto.
tika-s0305t0:143_14: so eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:144_0: Yo ārammaṇe iṭṭhāniṭṭhākāraṃ anādiyitvā gahetabbo majjhattākāro,
tika-s0305t0:144_1: yo ca pubbe upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāvasena uppanno majjhattākāro,
tika-s0305t0:144_2: duvidhopi so upekkhāya ārammaṇadhammoti adhippetoti āha –
tika-s0305t0:147_1: Khīṇāsavassa lokuttaraṃ sīlaṃ nāma maggaphalapariyāpannā sammāvācākammantājīvā sīlalakkhaṇappattā tadaññe cetanādayo.
tika-s0305t0:147_3: vārittasīlassa pana sambhavo eva natthi viramaṇavasena pavattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0305t0:148_1: Lakkhaṇassa dassananti sabhāvadhammānaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇassa ñātapariññāya,
tika-s0305t0:148_3: Pajahantopi hi te pahātabbākārato passati nāma.
tika-s0305t0:148_9: Pañhapayirupāsananti pañhapucchanavasena payirupāsanaṃ aññakammatthāya upasaṅkamanassa kevalaṃ upasaṅkamaneneva jotitattā.
tika-s0305t0:149_2: Aññesaṃyeva santiketi ariyehi aññesaṃ sāsanikānaṃyeva santike. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:149_5: Tattha hi pabbajjā ariyānaṃ anupabbajjā nāma na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:151_0: Saratīti taṃ ovādānusāsanidhammaṃ cinteti citte karoti.
tika-s0305t0:151_1: Vitakkāhataṃ karotīti punappunaṃ parivitakkanena tadatthaṃ vitakkanipphāditaṃ karoti.
tika-s0305t0:151_3: Taṃ pana sampādanaṃ pāripūri evāti āha “paripuṇṇo hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:151_6: Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ovādadhamme āgatānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:151_8: Pavicinatīti “idaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā vicayaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0305t0:151_9: Ñāṇañca ropetīti “aniccaṃ calaṃ palokaṃ pabhaṅgū”tiādinā ñāṇaṃ pavatteti.
tika-s0305t0:151_11: āpajjatīti rūpasattakārūpasattakakkamena vipassanaṃ paccakkhato viya aniccatādīnaṃ dassanaṃ sammasanaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0305t0:152_4: Samīpatthe hi idaṃ bhummanti āha “maraṇassa āsannakāle”ti.
tika-s0305t0:154_0: Avihādīsu vattamānopi ekaṃsato uddhaṃgamanāraho puggalo akaniṭṭhagāmī eva nāmāti vuttaṃ “eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca hontī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:154_3: tathāpi tattha bhūmīsu āyuṃ aggahetvā akaniṭṭhabhave āyuvaseneva soḷasakappasahassāyukatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0305t0:154_4: “Satta phalā sattānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti vuttattā “arahattamaggassa pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:154_5: Sattannampi sahabhāvo labbhatīti “apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:154_6: Tayidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ tattha tattha “tasmiṃ samaye”ti āgatavacanena viññāyati,
tika-s0305t0:157_1: “Satisambojjhaṅgo”ti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ hotīti satisambojjhaṅgo nāma seṭṭho uttamo pavaro,
tika-s0305t0:157_2: tasmāhaṃ satisambojjhaṅgasīsena phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharissāmīti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ pubbabhāge hotīti attho.
tika-s0305t0:157_4: sabbaso pamāṇakarakilesābhāvato appamāṇadhammārammaṇato ca appamāṇoti evaṃ mayhaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hoti.
tika-s0305t0:157_5: Suparipuṇṇoti bhāvanāpāripūriyā suṭṭhu paripuṇṇoti evaṃ mayhaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hotīti.
tika-s0305t0:157_6: Tiṭṭhatīti yathākālaparicchedasamāpattiyā avaṭṭhānena tappariyāpannatāya satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati paṭibandhavasena.
tika-s0305t0:157_9: Anuppādanti nibbānaṃ uppādābhāvato uppādavantehi ca vinissaṭattā.
tika-s0305t0:157_16: Āvajjitattā āvajjitakālato paṭṭhāya ārabbha pavattiyā satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0305t0:157_19: Aṭṭhahākārehīti uppādāvajjanādīhi ceva anuppādāvajjanādīhi ca vuttākāraviparītehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi cavantaṃ
tika-s0305t0:157_20: samāpattivasena anavaṭṭhānatopi gacchantaṃ cavatīti thero pajānātīti.
tika-s0305t0:158_1: Kiṃ pana te visuṃ visuṃ pavattantīti āha “yadā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0305t0:158_4: Tañca kho tathā katvā dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena.
tika-s0305t0:161_2: taṃ pana kissa kenāti pucchanto “kiṃ bujjhanatthāyā”ti vatvā taṃ dassento “maggenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:161_5: paṭhamavikappe sacchikiriyābhisamayo eva dassitoti tena atuṭṭhe “maggena vā”ti dutiyavikappamāha.
tika-s0305t0:161_6: Vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitanti padehi sabbaṃ maggakiccaṃ tassa phalañca dassitaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:161_9: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotītiādinā paccavekkhaṇā dassitā.
tika-s0305t0:164_2: Parisaṃ ogāḷho hutvā caratīti parisāvacaroti āha –
tika-s0305t0:164_12: Itivādo hotīti evaṃ imassa upari vādāropanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t0:164_14: Evaṃ vādappamokkhānisaṃsaṃ parehi āropitadosassa nibbeṭhanavasena dassetvā idāni dosapavedanavasena dassetuṃ “ayaṃ pucchāya doso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:165_0: Ettakaṃ ṭhānantiādito paṭṭhāya yāva “tīṇi sucaritānī”ti ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:165_4: Gocarajjhatte ṭhitaṃ hotīti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe samādhānavasena ṭhitaṃ hoti avaṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:165_9: Tasmiṃ amanāparūpadassane na maṅku vilakkho na hoti.
tika-s0305t0:166_0: Imesu chasu dvāresu aṭṭhārasa duccaritāni honti paccekaṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritabhedena.
tika-s0305t0:166_3: Tena “aniṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate dosaṃ uppādentassā”tiādinā tividhaduccaritaṃ nīharitvā vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:166_5: Manoduccaritādisāmaññena pana tīṇiyeva duccaritāni hontīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:167_0: Paññattivasenāti vatthuṃ anāmasitvā piṇḍagahaṇamukhena kevalaṃ paññattivaseneva.
tika-s0305t0:167_6: Pariṇāmetīti parivatteti duccaritāni tattha anuppādetvā sucaritāni uppādento.
tika-s0305t0:167_11: Ettāvatāti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva “tīṇi sucaritāni paripūrentī”ti padaṃ, ettāvatā.
tika-s0305t0:167_12: Sīlānurakkhakaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlanti catupārisuddhisīlassa anurakkhakaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ kathikaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:167_13: Kathaṃ pana tadeva tassa anurakkhakaṃ hotīti?
tika-s0305t0:168_8: satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:168_11: Pubbabhāgāvāti ettha keci “pubbabhāgā cā”ti pāṭhaṃ katvā “pubbeva lokuttarā pubbabhāgā cā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0305t0:168_14: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī”ti evaṃ vuttā bojjhaṅgā lokuttarāva vijjāvimuttisahagatabhāvato.
tika-s0305t0:171_4: Kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā suṭṭhu vimuttanti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvato tehi suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:171_6: “Mahā vata me ayaṃ attho uppanno”ti atthiko hutvā.
tika-s0305t0:173_0: 190. Tathāgatassa pātubhāvātiādinā buddhuppādakāle eva bojjhaṅgaratanapaṭilābhoti dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:179_4: Eseva nayo pāḷito atthato ca catutthena pañcamachaṭṭhānaṃ samānattā.
tika-s0305t0:183_1: Kittakena nu kho kāraṇena bujjhanakaaṅgā nāma vuccanti bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vattabbataṃ labhanti.
tika-s0305t0:183_2: Missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā sahavipassanā maggabojjhaṅgā kathitāti katvā.
tika-s0305t0:183_3: Dhammaparicchedo kathito gaṇanāmattena paricchinditvā vuttattā na bhūmantaraparicchedo,
tika-s0305t0:185_4: atha kho upanissayavasenapettha attho labbhatīti dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:185_5: Paṭhamavaggassa hi dutiye sutte upanissayavaseneva attho dassito.
tika-s0305t0:187_5: Nīvaraṇavigame sambhavato paccayato byāpādo vigato hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:187_8: Yañhi taṇhāsahagataṃ asahagatampi taṇhaṃ upanissāya nipphannaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:189_9: Te vā bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ nāma phalacittaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:189_11: Tampīti phalacittampi maggānantaratāya magganissitaṃ katvā missakameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati “bodhāya saṃvattantī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t0:191_2: Pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇāti gilitvā viya pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇākārā.
tika-s0305t0:193_4: Dhammo uppajjamāno ukkujjanto viya nirujjhamāno avakujjanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ukkujjaṃ vuccati udayo,
tika-s0305t0:193_7: “Eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho, yo te…pe…
tika-s0305t0:193_8: tathattāya upanessatī”ti pariyosāne bhagavato vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:193_9: Tena tenākārena viharantanti yena sammasanākārena vipassanāvihārena viharantaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:197_1: Na ca pabhāvantanti na ca pabhāsampannaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:197_6: Uppajjituṃ appadānenāti ettha nanu lokiyakusalacittassapi suvisuddhassa uppajjituṃ appadānena upakkilesatāti?
tika-s0305t0:197_12: Nīvaraṇe hi vūpasante santāne uppattiyā aparisuddhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t0:197_15: apica nippariyāyato uppajjituṃ appadāneneva tesaṃ upakkilesatāti dassento “yadaggena hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:197_17: Na āvarantīti kusaladhamme uppajjituṃ appadānavasena na āvaranti,
tika-s0305t0:199_0: 219. Paññā dubbalā hoti, na balavatī paṭipakkhena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato. Tenāha “mandā avisadā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:200_2: Tassā tadā uppannākārasallakkhaṇena avijahanto punappunaṃ tassā nibbattanena.
tika-s0305t0:200_4: Idaṃ sandhāyāti ettake divasepi na vinassanti,
tika-s0305t0:200_5: sā dhammapīti laddhapaccayā hutvā visesāvahāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya etaṃ “imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na hontī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:208_3: Tathā tathā vidahanatoti “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā tena tenākārena vidahanato ṭhapanato,
tika-s0305t0:210_4: Abbhuggatāyāti udīritā nibbattito tattha tattha gacchanato.
tika-s0305t0:210_13: Buddhā ca kadāci karahaci uppajjanti cakkavattinopi yebhuyyena tasmiṃyeva uppajjanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t0:211_5: Vattabbataṃ āpajjati bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti yathā –
tika-s0305t0:211_7: Laddhanāmassāti cakkavattīti loke laddhasamaññassa patthanīyassa purisavisesassa.
tika-s0305t0:211_11: tassa uppattiyā cakkaratanassa uppajjanato cakkavattīti evaṃ nāmaṃ uppajjati.
tika-s0305t0:211_12: “Cakkaṃ vattessatī”ti idaṃ pana niyāmaṃ anapekkhitvā tassa uppajjatīti ratanānuppattiṃ gahetvā vuttanayato saññā uppajjati “cakkavattī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:211_15: atha pacchā ratanāni pātubhavantīti bahūnaṃ pātubhāvaṃ upādāya bahulavacanatopi etaṃ “cakkavattissa pātubhāvā ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:211_18: Puññasambhāro bhinnasantānatāya ratanānampi pariyāyena upanissayahetūti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:212_5: Atidīghātirassatādiṃ chabbidhaṃ dosaṃ vivajjetvā ṭhitassāti vacanaseso.
tika-s0305t0:213_0: Sabbesaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ purecaraṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0305t0:213_1: Buddhādīhipi appahānīyatāya mahantadhammasabhāvattā dhammakāye ca jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena dhammakāyūpapannaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:213_5: Anādikālabhāvitassa kilesasantānassa khaṇeneva viddhaṃsanato sīghaṃ lahu javanti pariyāyā.
tika-s0305t0:215_2: eḷena mūgo viyāti eḷamūgoti imamatthaṃ dassento “mukhena vāca”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:219_5: Taṃ sabbattha satokārībhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0305t0:219_6: Yathā ca paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ anurūpadhammadesanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti,
tika-s0305t0:219_7: evaṃ satirahitapuggalavajjanā satokārīpuggalasevanā ca tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya
tika-s0305t0:220_4: Paripucchakatāti ācariyaṃ payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye sahaṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:220_6: kathaṃ imassa ko attho”ti evaṃ khandhādīsu atthapucchakabhāvo.
tika-s0305t0:221_0: Vatthuvisadakiriyāti cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ tappaṭibaddhāni ca cīvarādīni idha “vatthūnī”ti adhippetāni,
tika-s0305t0:221_5: Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-
tika-s0305t0:221_6: saddena aññampi sarīrassa ca cittassa ca pīḷāvahaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0305t0:221_13: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya ijjhantiyāpi aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0305t0:221_18: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā nissitāparisuddhi viya visayassa
tika-s0305t0:221_19: aparisuddhatāya visayīnaṃ aparisuddhiṃ dasseti anvayato byatirekato ca.
tika-s0305t0:222_1: Yathāpaccayaṃ saddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca
tika-s0305t0:222_4: Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā.
tika-s0305t0:222_5: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho,
tika-s0305t0:222_12: Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0305t0:222_13: taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā.
tika-s0305t0:222_14: Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ karontānaṃ saha pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
tika-s0305t0:223_0: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:223_2: Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti –
tika-s0305t0:223_4: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0305t0:223_5: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti.
tika-s0305t0:223_9: Tathā amanasikaraṇenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:223_11: Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0305t0:223_13: dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:223_14: tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ paṭutarabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samataṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:224_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimutto tattha ca katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassane pasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā – “kiṃ te, vakkali,
tika-s0305t0:224_1: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
tika-s0305t0:224_3: so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovadiyamāno kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
tika-s0305t0:224_4: Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsavissajjanena attānaṃ dassetvā –
tika-s0305t0:227_2: So tena vacanena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0305t0:227_4: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
tika-s0305t0:227_5: So satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0305t0:228_3: Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati,
tika-s0305t0:228_4: evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiyādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhikattā tassā.
tika-s0305t0:228_5: Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ
tika-s0305t0:228_9: So hi āyasmāpi satthu santikā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto –
tika-s0305t0:228_11: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
tika-s0305t0:228_12: kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamanameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu
tika-s0305t0:228_13: phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ pavattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0305t0:228_14: Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇopamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
tika-s0305t0:228_15: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yājetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatteva patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0305t0:229_2: Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññanātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:229_4: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samatāya sati aññamaññupatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0305t0:229_14: Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito,
tika-s0305t0:229_15: evaṃbhūto ca lūkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati,
tika-s0305t0:229_18: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho,
tika-s0305t0:230_3: Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavīti manasikāramattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti acintetvā “addhā sambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
tika-s0305t0:230_4: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0305t0:230_7: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti,
tika-s0305t0:230_13: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samānataṃ icchati,
tika-s0305t0:230_26: sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhikena bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā,
tika-s0305t0:230_29: Tassa hi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:231_2: Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:231_7: Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:231_8: tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0305t0:231_11: evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:232_0: “Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī”tiādinā vuttapañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇā niraye nibbattasattassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu,
tika-s0305t0:232_4: saddena tadaññamanussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhanīyakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0305t0:232_5: Ekaṃ buddhantaranti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesu eva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:232_7: ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukatāpi siyāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:232_8: Tathā hi kālo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ rūpadassāvī.
tika-s0305t0:233_0: Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinoti “vīriyāyatto eva sakalalokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamo”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa.
tika-s0305t0:233_4: Sā hi vaṭṭato niyyānāya gantabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.
tika-s0305t0:234_2: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍāya bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā piṇḍāpacāyanā.
tika-s0305t0:234_4: Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvāti vadanti.
tika-s0305t0:234_8: Sitaṃ karontovāti “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.
tika-s0305t0:235_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyassa posanabahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ paribhuñjitvā seyyasukhādiṃ
tika-s0305t0:235_2: “Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā”tiādinā bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālenakālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā.
tika-s0305t0:236_4: Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato.
tika-s0305t0:237_1: Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno.
tika-s0305t0:237_2: Dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti yojanā.
tika-s0305t0:237_3: Evaṃ sesaanussatīsu pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya ca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā.
tika-s0305t0:237_6: na samudācarantīti idaṃ upasamānussatiyā vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:237_7: Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tattha sapaññāya pavattanato bhāvanāmanasikāro
tika-s0305t0:237_8: kilesavikkhambhanasamattho hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0305t0:237_11: Sā ca tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha “asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve”ti.
tika-s0305t0:238_4: Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t0:238_5: Sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ ahetukanti ayameko anto,
tika-s0305t0:238_7: ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti.
tika-s0305t0:239_1: Samathāvahāpi tā honti samathāvahabhāveneva paññāvahattāti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe…
tika-s0305t0:240_4: Tassa paggaṇhananti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:241_12: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0305t0:241_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti. Evaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:242_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā,
tika-s0305t0:243_2: Tassa niggaṇhananti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:244_14: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. Evaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:245_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0305t0:245_8: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0305t0:245_9: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti,
tika-s0305t0:245_10: anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na uppādeti,
tika-s0305t0:245_12: Tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva vīthipaṭipattiyā abhāvena upasamasukhaṃ na vindati,
tika-s0305t0:246_0: Tassa saṃveguppādanañca pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:246_1: Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādiaññamaññavibādhanādihetukaṃ
tika-s0305t0:246_3: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāniyeva.
tika-s0305t0:246_4: Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino,
