tika-s0305t0:308_29: taṃ dassetuṃ “aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:308_30: Tattha niccasaññanti saṅkhārā niccāti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:309_0: Viharatīti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha –
tika-s0305t0:309_5: Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappa-
tika-s0305t0:309_7: saddopi vīriye eva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti.
tika-s0305t0:309_8: Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati,
tika-s0305t0:310_1: atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:310_5: uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sāmaṃ pajānantoti attho.
tika-s0305t0:310_8: Tasmā satiyā laddhupakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu anupassako,
tika-s0305t0:310_12: Upāyapariggahoti ettha sīlavisodhanādi gaṇanādi uggahakosallādi ca upāyo,
tika-s0305t0:310_14: Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassatī yathāvuttaṃ upāyaṃ na pariccajati,
tika-s0305t0:310_18: Tenāti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu apariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena.
tika-s0305t0:311_4: Satiggahaṇenevettha sammāsamādhissapi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0305t0:311_6: Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0305t0:311_9: tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya sampayogaṅgadassanatāti aṅga-
tika-s0305t0:311_14: tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento “tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā”ti āha.
tika-s0305t0:311_21: tā ca lokiyā eva anupassanā nāma sammasananti katvā.
tika-s0305t0:312_3: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya dukkhanti paññācakkhunā addakkhi.
tika-s0305t0:312_4: Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti dukkhavedanaṃ pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallanti addakkhi passi.
tika-s0305t0:312_6: Santanti sukhadukkhānaṃ viya anoḷārikatāya paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvattā ca santaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:312_7: Aniccatoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepato ca aniccanti yo addakkhi.
tika-s0305t0:312_8: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhūti so bhikkhu ekaṃsena,
tika-s0305t0:312_9: paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammā passanakoti attho.
tika-s0305t0:313_1: Sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannanti vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhanti vattabbato.
tika-s0305t0:313_2: Sukhadukkhatopi cāti sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmañāṇasukhatāya ca vipariṇāmaṭṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā
tika-s0305t0:313_3: tissopi sukhato tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho.
tika-s0305t0:314_14: saddena savatthukāvatthukādinānattassa puggalattayasādhāraṇāditabbhedassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t0:315_2: sāmaññalakkhaṇāna”nti hi iminā yo ito bāhirakehi sāminivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakabhāvena parikappito attā,
tika-s0305t0:315_3: tassa saṅkhāresu niccatā sukhatā viya katthacipi abhāvo vibhāvito.
tika-s0305t0:315_5: yasmā pana saṅkhāresu ekadhammopi attā na hoti,
tika-s0305t0:315_6: tasmā te na attātipi anattāti ayaṃ tesaṃ suññatadhammo.
tika-s0305t0:315_8: yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ abhidhamme “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādinā suññatavāradesanā vuttā.
tika-s0305t0:318_2: Ayaṃ pana na yāya kāyaci satiyā sato,
tika-s0305t0:318_12: Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu yo gamanādividhinā kāyassa purato abhihāro,
tika-s0305t0:318_19: Eseva nayoti iminā sarīrasseva abhimukhasaṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni nidasseti.
tika-s0305t0:319_1: Tena attanā kātabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:319_5: Sampajaññaṃ karotevāti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva,
tika-s0305t0:319_6: sampajānasseva vā kāro etassa atthīti sampajānakārī.
tika-s0305t0:320_0: Dhammato vaḍḍhitasaṅkhātena saha atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:320_3: Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:320_5: aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:320_12: Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “cetiyaṃ disvāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:322_1: Attho nāma dhammato vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:322_2: taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:322_4: yantapayogena vā vicittakammā paṭimāya sadisā yantarūpakā viya.
tika-s0305t0:322_6: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t0:323_1: ananuvattanakathā pana tassā aparā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:323_3: Evanti iminā “sace panā”tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttākāraṃ paccāmasati,
tika-s0305t0:324_0: Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuccatīti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara”nti.
tika-s0305t0:325_2: Na paccāharatīti āhārūpabhogato yāva divāṭṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti.
tika-s0305t0:325_3: Samādāya vattati sammā ādiyitvā tesaṃ vattānaṃ paripūraṇavasena vattati.
tika-s0305t0:325_5: Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo nisajjāvāre dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:325_11: Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti cetiyavandanāya paṭhamaṃ karaṇīyatā vuttā.
tika-s0305t0:326_0: Janasaṅgahaṇatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:326_1: Tasmāti yasmā “dhammakathā nāma kathetabbā evā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti,
tika-s0305t0:326_2: yasmā ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā.
tika-s0305t0:326_3: Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevāti attanā parihariyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto tadanuguṇaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā.
tika-s0305t0:326_5: Sampattaparicchedenevāti paricito aparicitotiādivibhāgaṃ akatvā sampattakoṭiyā eva,
tika-s0305t0:328_5: Yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati.
tika-s0305t0:328_6: Aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ pañcavidhacetovinibandhacitto.
tika-s0305t0:329_0: Gatapaccāgatikavattavasenāti bhāvanāsahitaṃyeva bhikkhāya gatapaccāgataṃ gamanapaccāgamanaṃ etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatikaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:329_6: Atha vā viññūnaṃ dhammānaṃ attaniyattā attabhāvaparicchannattā ca attā nāma dhammo.
tika-s0305t0:329_15: So eva nayo ayaṃ bhikkhūtiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto,
tika-s0305t0:330_1: Mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti.
tika-s0305t0:331_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo sallakkhetvā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:331_6: Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatanti “yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t0:332_3: evaṃ ito paresu ṭhānesu upanetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:332_4: Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambhārasambharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:332_7: itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:332_12: diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādivasappavattena saṃkhitteneva ovādena khippataraṃ visesaṃ adhigacchi.
tika-s0305t0:332_13: Tena vuttaṃ “khippābhiñño vā hoti seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti.
tika-s0305t0:333_2: Attā abhikkamatīti iminā andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0305t0:333_4: tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti,
tika-s0305t0:333_5: “tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti,
tika-s0305t0:333_7: Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo.
tika-s0305t0:333_8: Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t0:333_9: tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha dhātūnaṃ sāmatthiyato adhimattatā,
tika-s0305t0:333_12: Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0305t0:333_13: Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassānugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t0:334_6: tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0305t0:334_7: Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo.
tika-s0305t0:334_8: Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassānugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t0:334_12: Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo.
tika-s0305t0:334_13: Patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t0:334_14: tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo,
tika-s0305t0:335_1: tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0305t0:335_3: Rūpārūpadhammāti uddharaṇākārena pavattā rūpadhammā taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca.
tika-s0305t0:335_8: Pabbaṃ pabbantiādi uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:335_10: gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsamāgamatopi sīghataro.
tika-s0305t0:335_11: Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ taṭataṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati,
tika-s0305t0:336_0: Saddhiṃ rūpenāti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:336_8: Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāventāyeva uppajjantīti
tika-s0305t0:336_11: Evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanipphatti soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā,
tika-s0305t0:336_17: pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva,
tika-s0305t0:337_1: aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:337_3: taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayo hutvā eva nirujjhatīti tathāladdhapaccayaṃ aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:337_8: evaṃ anu anu pabandho cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattati.
tika-s0305t0:338_1: Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā,
tika-s0305t0:338_3: tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha “vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhana”nti.
tika-s0305t0:338_6: pacchato āgacchantassa parissayassa parivajjanādivasena apalokitassa ca siyā sambhavoti āha –
tika-s0305t0:339_2: Sohāyasmā vipassanākāle eva “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto,
tika-s0305t0:339_8: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
tika-s0305t0:340_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0305t0:340_1: Tasmāti kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva gocarasampajaññabhāvatoti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati.
tika-s0305t0:340_3: khandhādikammaṭṭhānikehi añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t0:340_5: tasmā tassa yāthāvato pajānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:340_8: Uddhaṃ laṅghetīti laṅghantaṃ viya upari gacchati.
tika-s0305t0:341_3: sattamajavanepi na hotīti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:341_4: Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhamattaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:341_10: āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena ceva ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā.
tika-s0305t0:341_11: Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesūti heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha.
tika-s0305t0:345_1: Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:345_2: “Cīvarampi acetana”ntiādinā cīvarassa viya kāyopi acetanoti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena “abbhantare”tiādinā
tika-s0305t0:347_1: Mahāsivattheravādavasena “imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā nayena vutto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t0:347_2: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “neva davāyātiādinā nayenā”ti pana idaṃ paṭikkhepaṅgadassanamukhena pāḷi āgatāti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:348_0: Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātuyāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha –
tika-s0305t0:348_3: Vītiharatīti tato kucchiyaṃ vimissaṃ karonto harati.
tika-s0305t0:348_7: Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti,
tika-s0305t0:348_8: na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyā kiccabhāvena vuttāni,
tika-s0305t0:348_9: sā eva dhāraṇādīni kiccāni karontassa sādhāraṇāti vuttāni.
tika-s0305t0:348_10: Allattañca anupāletīti yathā vāyodhātuādīhi aññehi visosanaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0305t0:348_14: Añjaso hotīti āhārassa pavisanādīnaṃ maggo hoti.
tika-s0305t0:348_21: Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ anvāya āgamma ābhujati samannāharati.
tika-s0305t0:348_22: Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:349_4: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo,
tika-s0305t0:349_7: Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo,
tika-s0305t0:350_0: Sarīrato sedā muccantīti vegasandhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhato sarīrato sedā muccanti.
tika-s0305t0:350_3: Kuddhā hi manussā amanussāpi vā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti.
tika-s0305t0:350_5: kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca na parassa,
tika-s0305t0:351_0: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato,
tika-s0305t0:351_2: “Gamanepi purato pacchato ca kāyassa abhiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahita”nti apare.
tika-s0305t0:351_4: tasmā antarantare iriyāpathe pavattānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitāti.
tika-s0305t0:351_6: eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento,
tika-s0305t0:351_14: Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti.
tika-s0305t0:351_15: Yo bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti –
tika-s0305t0:351_16: “pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t0:351_17: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t0:351_18: caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t0:351_19: caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t0:351_20: ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0305t0:351_21: nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
tika-s0305t0:351_22: evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0305t0:351_24: Ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
tika-s0305t0:352_3: tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati –
tika-s0305t0:352_8: evaṃ pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0305t0:352_9: pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhatīti ayaṃ sutte sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
tika-s0305t0:352_10: Kāyikādikiriyānibbattanena tammayattā āvajjanakiriyānibbattakattā āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:352_12: tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0305t0:352_13: Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
tika-s0305t0:353_0: Vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitasappāyakathaṃ
tika-s0305t0:353_2: Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0305t0:353_3: Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhārappahānato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāmāti.
tika-s0305t0:353_6: Tadanurūpaṃ payoganti tassa uppattiyā anucchavikaṃ cittassa pavattiākārasaññitaṃ payogaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:356_2: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhamma”nti saṃkhittena dhammadesanaṃ yāci,
tika-s0305t0:356_4: tasmā saṃkhitteneva dhammaṃ desetukāmo bhagavā “tasmātihā”tiādimāhāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t0:358_1: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhe apātanavasena dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammo,
tika-s0305t0:358_3: tadeva tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ vinayanaṭṭhena vinayoti āha –
tika-s0305t0:358_5: Paṭipakkhadhammehi anabhibhūtatāya eko udetīti ekodīti laddhanāmo samādhi bhūto jāto etesanti ekodibhūtā.
tika-s0305t0:358_6: Ettha ca ekodibhūtāti etena upacārajjhānāvaho pubbabhāgiko samādhi vutto.
tika-s0305t0:358_8: Ekaggacittāti etena subhāvito vasippatto appanāsamādhi vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0305t0:358_14: sekkhānaṃ pana satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā pariññatthāya pavattā lokiyā,
tika-s0305t0:362_17: attano balamadena lāpaṃ atimaññitvā vadantīti attho.
tika-s0305t0:362_21: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṃ vadamānā”ti,
tika-s0305t0:362_26: Suṭṭhu ṭhapetvāti jiyāmuttasarassa viya sīghapātayogyatākaraṇena ubho pakkhe sammā ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0305t0:364_3: Kājasikkā viyāti kājadaṇḍake olaggetabbā sikkā viya.
tika-s0305t0:364_4: Apica catasso rajjuyo upari bandhanaṭṭhānañcāti pañcaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:366_13: Idaṃ me kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃvāti idaṃ mama kammaṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ pavattamānaṃ anulomāvasānameva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0305t0:366_14: Evaṃ puna pavattamānaṃ ussakkitvā visesanibbattanatthameva hotīti evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti bālo abyatto,
tika-s0305t0:366_17: Pubbabhāgavipassanā satipaṭṭhānāva kathitā “sakassa cittassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t0:368_6: lakkhaṇo mittabhāvo yesu atthi, te mittā.
tika-s0305t0:368_12: Pañcamiyaṃ aṭṭhamiyaṃ cātuddasiyaṃ pañcadasiyanti ekekasmiṃ pakkhe cattāro vāre katvā māsassa aṭṭhavāre.
tika-s0305t0:369_1: Ābādhoti pubbakammahetutāya kammasamuṭṭhāno ābādho saṅkhāradukkhatāsaṅkhāto sabbakālikattā sarīrassa sabhāgarogo nāma.
tika-s0305t0:369_12: Jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro patituṃ adatvā attabhāvassa abhisaṅkharaṇato.
tika-s0305t0:370_0: “Ettakaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti khaṇaparicchedavatī samāpatti khaṇikasamāpatti.
tika-s0305t0:370_1: Niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvāti rūpasattakārūpasattakavasena pavattiyamānaṃ vipassanābhāvanaṃ sabbaso khilavirahena niggumbaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:370_3: Mahāvipassanāvasenāti paccekaṃ savisesaṃ vitthāritānaṃ aṭṭhārasādīnaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ vasena vipassitvā samāpannā yā samāpatti,
tika-s0305t0:370_4: sā suṭṭhu vikkhambheti vedanaṃ mahābalavatāya pubbārammaṇassa,
tika-s0305t0:372_0: Anantaraṃ abāhiranti dhammavasena puggalavasena ca antarabāhiraṃ akatvā.
tika-s0305t0:372_3: Na evaṃ hotīti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”tiādiko mānataṇhāmūlako issāmacchariyānaṃ pavattiākāro tathāgatassa na hoti,
tika-s0305t0:372_7: Maññeti yathāvuttaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇasaññitena veṭhamissakena viya jarasakaṭaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:373_0: Phalasamāpattiyā adhippetattā “ekaccānaṃ vedanānanti lokiyānaṃ vedanāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:373_5: So hi catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyato “dīpo”ti vutto.
tika-s0305t0:373_8: Te “dhammadīpā viharathā”ti vuttā catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissanti.
tika-s0305t0:375_3: svāyaṃ pubbāparaviseso upādāyupādāya gahetabboti taṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:376_0: Uppajjati kilesapariḷāhoti kāye asubhādivasena manasikāraṃ adahantassa manasikārassa vīthiyaṃ apaṭipannatā
tika-s0305t0:376_2: Vīriyārambhassa abhāvena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cetaso vā līnattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t0:376_4: Evaṃ kilesapariḷāhe cātiādinā tividhampi bhāvanānuyogassa kilesavatthubhāvaṃ upādāya samuccayavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:376_5: Yasmā pana te pariḷāhalīnattavikkhepā ekajjhaṃ na pavattanti,
tika-s0305t0:376_10: Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesasahagate vitakkavicāre na pavatteti.
tika-s0305t0:377_1: Yasmā hi imassa bhikkhuno taṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ paripanthe sati ṭhapetvā buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā,
tika-s0305t0:377_8: Sukheneva kilesānaṃ okāsaṃ adento antarā asajjanto alagganto.
tika-s0305t0:382_0: 378. Dutiyavagge paṭhamasuttaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyanti taṃ laṅghitvā “dutiye”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:383_3: Sammā anavasesato bujjhati etenāti sambodhīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:383_5: Nippadesā gahitāti anavasesā buddhaguṇā gahitā aggamaggasiddhiyāva bhagavato sabbaguṇānaṃ siddhattā.
tika-s0305t0:383_7: atha kho aggasāvakapaccekabuddhānampi taṃtaṃguṇasamijjhanaṃ aggamaggādhigamenevāti dassento “dvepi aggasāvakā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:384_1: pasannoti iminā pasādassa vattamānatā dīpitāti uppannasaddhoti imināpi saddhāya paccuppannatā pakāsitāti āha –
tika-s0305t0:384_5: So eva atisayavacanicchāvasena bhiyyobhiññataroti vuttoti āha –
tika-s0305t0:384_11: Svāyaṃ assa atisayo abhiññāya bhiyyobhāvakatoti āha –
tika-s0305t0:384_20: nanu heṭṭhimānipi bhagavato maggañāṇāni savāsanameva yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanavasena pavattāni.
tika-s0305t0:384_23: taṃ pana aparipuṇṇaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanassa vippakatabhāvatoti āha “arahattamaggañāṇe vā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:385_6: idha pana āsabhī viyāti āsabhī. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:385_11: Vijjāṭṭhānādīsu kataparicayānaṃ ācariyānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpentī paveṇī ācariyaparamparā.
tika-s0305t0:385_12: Kevalaṃ attano matiyā “iti kira evaṃ kirā”ti parikappanā itikirā.
tika-s0305t0:385_13: Piṭakassa ganthassa sampadānato bhūtato tassa gahaṇaṃ piṭakasampadānaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:385_16: Āgamādhigamehi vinā kevalaṃ anussutato takkamaggaṃ nissāya takkanaṃ takko.
tika-s0305t0:385_18: Yasmā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā bhagavato ayaṃ therassa codanā therassa ca so avisayo,
tika-s0305t0:386_1: Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato anuyogaṃ sodheti nāma,
tika-s0305t0:386_7: so eva tattha anuyogaṃ detīti yujjati.
tika-s0305t0:387_0: Sabbe teti sabbe te atīte niruddhe sammāsambuddhe.
tika-s0305t0:387_2: ye te ahesuṃ atītamaddhānaṃ tava abhinīhārato oraṃ sammāsambuddhā,
tika-s0305t0:387_3: tesaṃ tāva sāvakañāṇagocare dhamme paricchindanto mārādayo viya ca buddhānaṃ lokiyacittācāraṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi.
tika-s0305t0:387_5: tato parato chinnavaṭumā chinnapapañcā pariyādinnavaṭṭā sabbadukkhavītivattā sammāsambuddhā,
tika-s0305t0:387_6: tesaṃ sabbesampi tava sāvakañāṇassa avisayabhūte dhamme kathaṃ jānissasīti.
tika-s0305t0:387_9: Samādhipakkhāti samādhi ca samādhipakkhā ca samādhipakkhā ekadesasarūpekasesanayena.
tika-s0305t0:387_10: Tattha samādhipakkhāti vīriyasatiyo tadanuguṇā ca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0305t0:387_12: jhānasamāpattiyo samādhippadhānāti vuttaṃ “samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahito”ti.
tika-s0305t0:388_0: Yathā pana heṭṭhā gahitāpi samādhipaññā paṭipakkhato vimuttattā vimuccana- saṅkhāta-
tika-s0305t0:388_4: tasmā sabbesaṃ samāpattivihārānaṃ vasenettha attho yujjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:388_8: Sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā asaṃsaṭṭhattā vimuttattā ca nissaraṇavimutti nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:389_2: Tena atītesu tāva khandhānaṃ bhūtapubbattā tattha siyā ñāṇassa savisaye gati,
tika-s0305t0:389_3: anāgatesu pana sabbaso asañjātesu kathanti imamatthaṃ joteti.
tika-s0305t0:389_6: Nanu atītānāgate sattāhe eva pavattaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa visayo,
tika-s0305t0:389_11: Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti sikkhāpadeneva tādisassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhittattā setughātato ca.
tika-s0305t0:389_12: Kathaṃ pana thero dvayasambhave paṭikkhepameva akāsi,
tika-s0305t0:389_22: Buddhasīlādayo hi buddhānaṃ buddhakiccassa parehi ete buddhāti jānanassa ca kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:390_0: Anumānañāṇaṃ viya saṃsayaṭṭhitaṃ ahutvā idamidanti yathāsabhāvato ñeyyaṃ dhāreti nicchinotīti dhammo,
tika-s0305t0:390_3: Paccakkhasiddhañhi atthaṃ anugantvā anumānañāṇassa pavatti “diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa anumāna”nti veditabbā.
tika-s0305t0:390_4: Vidite vedakampi ñāṇaṃ atthato viditameva hotīti “anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:390_11: Etena thero yaṃ yaṃ anumeyyamatthaṃ ñātukāmo hoti,
tika-s0305t0:390_12: tattha tattha tassa asaṅgamappaṭihataṃ anumānañāṇaṃ pavattetīti dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:391_4: Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā thero attānaṃ dassetīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0305t0:392_0: Yassā paññāya vasena puriso paṇḍitoti vuccati,
tika-s0305t0:392_6: Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti ṭhānuppattikā,
tika-s0305t0:392_13: So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:392_21: Uppannāya paññāya nīvaraṇehi na kiñci kātuṃ sakkāti āha “anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na dentī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:392_23: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittāti catubbidhāyapi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sammadeva ṭhapitacittā appitacittā.
tika-s0305t0:392_24: Yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvāti yāthāvato sammadeva yathā paṭipakkhā samucchijjanti,
tika-s0305t0:393_0: Purimanaye satipaṭṭhānāni bojjhaṅgā ca missakā adhippetāti tato aññathā vattuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:393_2: “Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittāti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā satipaṭṭhānesu vipassanaṃ gahetvā satta
tika-s0305t0:393_3: bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvāti vuttattā maggapariyāpannānaṃyeva ca nesaṃ nippariyāyabojjhaṅgabhāvato
tika-s0305t0:393_4: tesu ca adhigatameva hotīti bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyyā”ti
tika-s0305t0:394_1: Nagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ tadatthikehi upagantabbato upagatānañca parissayarahitasukhādhigamaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0305t0:394_2: Pākāro viya sīlaṃ tadupagatānaṃ parito ārakkhabhāvato.
tika-s0305t0:394_7: Paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati nibbānanagaraṃ paviṭṭhapavisanakānaṃ sattānaṃ sallakkhaṇato.
tika-s0305t0:396_1: Pubbe sāvatthito veḷuvagāmassa gatattā vuttaṃ “āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto”ti.
tika-s0305t0:396_7: Natthi nu khoti etthāpi “olokento”ti ānetvā sambandho sīhāvalokanañāyena.
tika-s0305t0:396_8: Bhavissanti me vattāro harituṃ nāsakkhīti sambandho.
tika-s0305t0:396_10: na tattha sālayatādassanaṃ yathā tathāgatassa vesāliyā nikkhamitvā nāgāpalokitaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:397_0: Tassa tassa visesassa adhiṭṭhānavaseneva iddhibhedadassanaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:397_1: Sīhassa vijambhanādivasena kīḷitvā nādasadisī ayaṃ dhammakathāti vuttaṃ “sīhavikīḷito dhammapariyāyo”ti.
tika-s0305t0:397_4: Tena therena yathārambhassa vacanapabandhassa samāpitabhāvaṃ joteti.
tika-s0305t0:397_9: saddo na sakkomīti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbo.
tika-s0305t0:398_1: Patthanākāle anomadassissa bhagavato vacanasutānusārena ñāṇena diṭṭhamattataṃ sandhāya “taṃ paṭhamadassana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:398_3: Esa maggoti eso jātānaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaniṭṭhito pantho.
tika-s0305t0:398_4: Punapi evaṃbhāvino nāma saṅkhārāti saṅkhārā nāma evaṃbhāvino,
tika-s0305t0:399_1: Yasmā dhammasenāpatino arahattappattadivaseyeva satthu sāvakasannipāto ahosi,
tika-s0305t0:401_5: parehi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajanavasena pavattaṃ dhammasambhoganti desanādhammameva vadati.
tika-s0305t0:402_7: So bhijjeyyāti so mahantataro khandho bhijjeyya.
tika-s0305t0:403_1: Mahākhandho viyāti mahanto sāravanto sākhākhandho viya.
tika-s0305t0:409_7: Jātiyā khayo vaṭṭadukkhassa antabhūtoti jātikkhayanto, nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:409_8: taṃ diṭṭhattā jātikkhayantadassīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t0:411_1: Ayaṃ tassa laddhīti ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā tassa ācariyassa laddhi.
tika-s0305t0:411_4: Tathā namanto hi patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t0:411_7: Ākaḍḍhento viyāti namitaṭṭhānato parabhāgena ākaḍḍhento viya.
tika-s0305t0:411_8: Ekatobhāgiyaṃ katvāti yathāvuttaṃ satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā onataṃ viya katvā.
tika-s0305t0:411_9: Tathā karaṇaṃ pana tathā vātūpatthambhagāhāpanenāti āha –
tika-s0305t0:411_11: Tañca satiyā tadatthaṃ upaṭṭhānenāti vuttaṃ “satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:411_14: “Ācariyo vaṃsaṃ suggahitaṃ gaṇhanto”tiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-s0305t0:412_0: “Attānameva rakkhatī”ti idaṃ attano rakkhaṇaṃ padhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:412_2: Attarakkhāya panettha sijjhamānāya antevāsikarakkhāpi siddhā eva hotīti.
tika-s0305t0:412_4: So tattha ñāyoti yā attano eva rakkhā,
tika-s0305t0:412_5: sā atthato pararakkhāpi hotīti ayamettha ñāyo yuttappayogo.
tika-s0305t0:412_9: Āsevanāyātiādīni padāni anudayatāpariyosānāni (yasmā satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevantassa siddhaṃ attano ca parassa ca rakkhaṇaṃ pakāsenti, tasmā) – “attānaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:414_1: Janapadasmiṃ kalyāṇīti sakalajanapade bhaddā rūpasampattiyā sikkhāsampattiyā ca sundarā seṭṭhā.
tika-s0305t0:414_2: Rūpasampatti ca nāma sabbaso rūpadosābhāvena rūpaguṇapāripūriyā hotīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:414_5: Nātidīghā nātirassāti pamāṇamajjhimā dīghatarappamāṇā na hoti,
tika-s0305t0:414_8: Nātikisāti ativiya kisathaddhamaṃsalohitā dissamānā aṭṭhisarīrā jālasarīrā na hoti.
tika-s0305t0:414_10: Nātikāḷā nāccodātāti ativiya kāḷavaṇṇā jhāmaṅgāro viya,
tika-s0305t0:414_12: Manussaloke tādisiyā rūpasampattiyā abhāvato atikkantā manussavaṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:414_14: evaṃ ārohapariṇāhayogato ca paresaṃ pasādāvahā nātidīghatādayo.
tika-s0305t0:414_16: Ettha ca nātidīghanātirassatāvacanena ārohasampatti vuttā ubbedhena pāsādikabhāvato.
tika-s0305t0:415_5: Te vā vīsatiyāsūtiraṃ dhānappattiyā pavattiyā pavattimakatamandatā vibhāvasuṭatassa uttamameva gītañca
tika-s0305t0:415_6: gāyatīti attho.) [Etthantare pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca.
tika-s0305t0:415_7: Suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.] Samatittiko telapattoti mukhavattisamaṃ telānaṃ pūritattā samatittikamukhaṃ telabhājanaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:415_8: Antarena ca mahāsamajjaṃ antarena ca janapadakalyāṇinti janapadakalyāṇiyā,
tika-s0305t0:415_9: tassā ca naccagītaṃ pekkhituṃ sannipatitamahājanasamūhassa majjhato pariharitabbo netabbo.
tika-s0305t0:419_2: Tañhi sīlanaṭṭhena ekavidhampi cārittādivasena anekavidhaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:419_4: Pañhamaggoti ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa vīmaṃsanaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:423_1: Padesato bhāvitattāti ekadesato bhāvitattā bhāvanāpāripūriyā ananuppattattā. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:427_3: “Satatavihāravasena vutta”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “thero kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:427_6: Anubandhati cakkavāḷānaṃ sahassaṃ ekāvajjaneneva sahassalokadhātuyā icchitamatthaṃ jānituṃ samatthoti dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:430_1: Yā vedanā sammasitvāti yā tebhūmakavedanā sammasitvā.
tika-s0305t0:430_2: Tāvassāti tā tebhūmakavedanā eva assa bhikkhuno.
tika-s0305t0:430_8: saññā diṭṭhipapañcassa mūlavasena sammasanaṃ vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0305t0:434_0: 408. Sārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānāti ārammaṇalakkhitā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā, na satilakkhaṇā.
tika-s0305t0:436_0: 410. Suddhikaṃ katvā visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “kāye vā bhikkhū”ti.
tika-s0305t0:438_4: Tattha pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlanti avadhāraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0305t0:438_5: Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu ca chasikkhāpadavītikkamane gilānapaccayassa appaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti.
tika-s0305t0:438_7: Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti nippariyāyasīlataṃ tesaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0305t0:438_12: Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t0:438_13: Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānasīlassa paripālanaparisodhanavasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:438_14: Idāni pātimokkhasīlasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:439_0: Ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannoti kāyikacetasikaavītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena ca navesiyādigocaratādisaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampanno,
tika-s0305t0:439_5: Te pana ekantato akusalā hontīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:439_8: paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā dassanasīlo.
tika-s0305t0:439_9: Sammā ādiyitvāti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvā.
tika-s0305t0:439_10: Sikkhāpadesūti niddhāraṇe bhummanti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento “sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpada”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:439_20: Imasmiṃ atthavikappe sikkhāpadesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato. Tenāha –
tika-s0305t0:439_22: “Tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāyā”ti vacanato anabhijjhā abyāpādasammādiṭṭhiyopi sīlanti vuttā,
tika-s0305t0:441_1: Etthāpi manosucaritaṃ sīlaṃ nāmāti dassetīti katvā vuttaṃ “pacchimāpi tayo”ti.
tika-s0305t0:441_2: Anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā sīlaṃ hotīti veditabbā kāyavacīsucaritehi saddhiṃ manosucaritampi
tika-s0305t0:441_3: vatvā “tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāyā”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0305t0:441_7: Vaggapeyyālato pana imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte katipayavaggā saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā,
tika-s0305t0:441_8: tathāpi tesaṃ atthavisesābhāvato ekaccesu potthakesu mukhamattaṃ dassetvā saṃkhittā,
tika-s0305t0:445_6: vasenāti catubhūmakadhammaparicchedavasena ceva kusalādīhi sabbasaṅgāhakadhammaparicchedavasena ca vuttanti attho.
tika-s0305t0:447_3: Samudayasaccavasenāti taṇhāvijjādiṃ saddhindriyassa samudayasaccabhāvena na pajānanti.
tika-s0305t0:448_2: Tasmā paṭhamuppannā saddhā eva hettha “āvajjana”nti vuttā,
tika-s0305t0:448_5: Tasmā paṭhamuppannā āvajjanā paggahuppattiṭṭhānānaṃ tikkhānaṃ vīriyindriyādīnaṃ paṭhamuppattiyā āvajjanapariyāyena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:448_6: Dubbalā hi paṭhamuppannā paggahābhāvato vīriyindriyādīnaṃ samudayoti balavabhāvappattavīriyindriyādikassa
tika-s0305t0:448_8: pubbe adhimuccanādivasena pavattassa āvajjanassa samudayāti attho.
tika-s0305t0:448_9: Puna chandavasenāti kattukāmatākusalacchandavasena saddhādīnaṃ uppādetukāmatākārappavattassa chandassa vasena.
tika-s0305t0:448_10: Manasikāravasena āvajjanasamudayāti saddhindriyādivasena pavattassa dubbalassa tassa nibbattakayonisomanasikāravasena āvajjanassa uppattiyā.
tika-s0305t0:448_12: Chasu suttesūti dutiyato paṭṭhāya chasu suttesu.
tika-s0305t0:450_6: Tāni pana tīsu ṭhānesu saddhā ariyakantasīlañcāti veditabbāni.
tika-s0305t0:450_11: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:450_18: Evañca katvā “sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā”ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t0:450_20: Ariyasaccāni patvāti cattāri saccāni abhisametabbāni pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0305t0:452_5: tassa bhāvo nepakkanti satiyāpi nepakkabhāvo yujjateva.
tika-s0305t0:452_7: satiyā ca nepakkenāti evaṃ vuccamānena satiniddeso nāma kato hotiyeva.
tika-s0305t0:452_8: Asukaṃ nāma suttaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā me bhāsitanti.
tika-s0305t0:452_9: Vossajjīyati saṅkhāragataṃ etasmiṃ adhigateti vossaggo, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:452_12: Gacchantiyāti saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca udayabbayaṃ gacchantiyā bujjhantiyā.
tika-s0305t0:452_18: so anuppannāna”ntiādinā ca vuttattā vīriyindriyaṃ missakaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:456_3: Yathā vīriyindriyaniddese “cattāro sammappadhāne ārabbha vīriyaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti desanā āgatā,
tika-s0305t0:456_4: evaṃ satindriyaniddese “cattāro satipaṭṭhāne ārabbha satiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti,
tika-s0305t0:458_1: Indriyānaṃ tikkhādibhāvo vipassanāvasena vā maggavasena vā phalavasena vā gahetabboti vuttaṃ “tatoti…pe…
tika-s0305t0:458_3: Nanu cettha mudubhāvo eva pāḷiyaṃ gahitoti?
tika-s0305t0:458_5: taṃ pana tikkhabhāve asati na hoti tikkhādibhāvoti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:458_7: ito taṃ tikkhanti vattabbataṃ labhati apekkhāsiddhattā tikkhamudubhāvānaṃ pārāpāraṃ viya.
tika-s0305t0:458_8: Idāni “tato”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “samattānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:458_15: “tato mudutarānī”ti vuttapaṭhamamaggo dhammānusārī vā siyā saddhānusārī vāti byabhicarati?
tika-s0305t0:458_18: Yo hi sotāpanno hutvā iriyāpathaṃ akopetvā yathānisinnova sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0305t0:458_21: Yo pana sotāpanno hutvā kālantarena sakadāgāmī hoti,
tika-s0305t0:458_22: tassa sotāpattimaggatthāya pavattāni vipassanindriyāni nāma honti.
tika-s0305t0:458_24: tassa yathāvuttavipassanindriyato mudutarānīti “tato mudutarāni dhammānusārīmaggassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:458_26: Dhammānusārīvipassanindriyato saddhānusārīvipassanindriyānaṃ mudubhāvassa kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0305t0:459_0: Evaṃ vipassanāvasena dassetvā maggavasena dassetuṃ “tathā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:460_2: tasmā te dvepi idha tatiyavāre na labbhantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0305t0:460_3: Dhammānusārīsaddhānusārīnaṃ nānattaṃ kathaṃ jātanti āha “āgamanenapi maggenapī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:461_4: Dhammānusārīpuggalo hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena appakasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0305t0:461_5: Saddhānusārīpuggalo pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0305t0:461_6: tasmā dhammānusārissa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ hutvā vahati,
tika-s0305t0:461_7: yathā nāma tikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t0:461_12: saddhānusārino pana pubbabhāgakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ dandhaṃ na tikhiṇaṃ asūraṃ hutvā vahati,
tika-s0305t0:461_13: yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0305t0:461_20: Avasesā ca kilesā khīyanti saṃyojanakkhayāya yogattā.
tika-s0305t0:465_1: Sīlakkhandhādīhi saddhindriyādīhi ca parito pūraṇena paripūraṃ arahattamaggaṃ karonto nipphattito arahattaphalaṃ ārādheti nipphādeti.
tika-s0305t0:465_2: Tayo padesamaggeti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ apāripūriyā ekadesabhūte tayo heṭṭhimamagge.
tika-s0305t0:465_4: Catūsūti imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamādīsu catūsu suttesu.
tika-s0305t0:465_8: “catūsupi suttesu missakāneva indriyāni kathitānī”ti pana vacanato vipassanāvasenapi yojanā labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:467_3: imasmiṃ sutte sabbasova vipassanindriyānaṃ eva adhippetattā.
tika-s0305t0:467_4: Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “paripuṇṇāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:467_5: Avihādīsu pañcasu suddhāvāsesu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato antarāparinibbāyī,
tika-s0305t0:467_8: uddhaṃ vāhibhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti uddhaṃsoto,
tika-s0305t0:467_9: uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto,
tika-s0305t0:467_10: akaniṭṭhabhavaṃ gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmīti evamettha saddattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0305t0:468_3: Pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbānīti “tato mudutarehi antarāparinibbāyī hotī”tiādīni pañca nissakkāni niddhāretvā kathetabbāni.
tika-s0305t0:468_5: Tattha avihādīsu uppajjitvā uppannasamanantarāya parinibbāyanato paṭhamaantarāparinibbāyī.
tika-s0305t0:468_7: āyuvemajjhaṃ patvā parinibbāyanato tato paraṃ tatiyaantarāparinibbāyī veditabbo.
tika-s0305t0:468_10: Na vattabbanti dassento āha “asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyinopi eteva pañca janā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:469_0: Tīṇi nissakkānīti “tato mudutarehi sotāpanno hotī”tiādīni tīṇi nissakkapadāni.
tika-s0305t0:469_5: mudutarānīti idaṃ sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyehi ekabījisaṅkhātasotāpannavipassanindriyāni mudutarāni hontīti tīṇi katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:469_9: Chaṭṭhasattamāni vuttanayānevāti chaṭṭhasattamāni suttāni dutiyatatiyesu vuttanayāneva.
tika-s0305t0:471_3: Aṭṭhahīti catūhi phalehi catūhi ca maggehīti aṭṭhahi.
tika-s0305t0:477_7: Imesu hi upādinnaindriyesu sati vaṭṭaṃ vattati paññāyati.
tika-s0305t0:479_10: tasmā taṃ kiccaṃ sesadhammesupi samāropetvā vuttaṃ “aññātāvīsu arahattaphaladhammesū”ti.
tika-s0305t0:481_3: Tīṇi nissakkāni evamidha pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni ekabījiādivibhāvanato.
tika-s0305t0:481_5: Sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma tenattabhāvena sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pattuṃ gacchantassa sotāpannassa vipassanindriyāni.
tika-s0305t0:481_6: Pañcapi te sotāpattimaggassa bhedāyevāti “sakadāgāmimagge ṭhatvā nīharitabbānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:482_1: Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃ khandhabījaṃ atthi,
tika-s0305t0:482_8: Ettakañhi pamāṇaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti,
tika-s0305t0:482_10: ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:483_0: Dve tayo bhaveti devamanussesu eva dve tayo bhave.
tika-s0305t0:483_1: Sambodhicatusaccadhammo paraṃ ayanaṃ nissayo gati etassāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
tika-s0305t0:483_3: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule uppatti nāma natthi,
tika-s0305t0:483_7: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhaveti ayampi missakabhavena kathito.
tika-s0305t0:483_8: Jātassa kumārassa viya ariyāya jātiyā jātassa nāmametaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:483_9: yadidaṃ niyatoti sattakkhattuparamādikoti ca samaññāti dassento āha “bhagavatā gahitanāmavasenevā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t0:484_0: Yadi pubbahetuniyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti sotāpattimaggato uddhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ upanissayābhāvato
tika-s0305t0:484_3: tāva niyamato sotāpattimagguppattito pubbe eva niyamito,
tika-s0305t0:484_8: Niyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti paṭhamamaggādhigameneva anukkamena upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccāni nipphajjanti,
tika-s0305t0:484_9: evaṃ sattakkhattuparamatādiniyame sati sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattatāya dukkhassa mūlabhūtā kilesā
tika-s0305t0:484_10: paṭhamamaggeneva khīṇāti upari tayo maggā akiccā siyuṃ.
tika-s0305t0:485_0: Yadi upari tayo maggā sattakkhattuparamāditaṃ niyamenti,
tika-s0305t0:485_1: tato ca añño sotāpanno natthīti sotāpattimaggassa akiccakatā nippayojanatā āpajjeyya.
tika-s0305t0:485_5: yāva uparimaggā eva hontīti sattabhavādito uddhamapavattanato tena vinānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādippahānena ca tena vinā bhavitabbanti āha –
tika-s0305t0:485_6: “paṭhamamagge anuppanneva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjatī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:485_8: Vipassanā niyametīti yujjatīti vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “sace hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:486_2: Idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇasukkhavipassakassāti yo imasmiṃ kāmabhave ṭhito manussadevavasena vokiṇṇabhavūpapattiko sukkhavipassako ca,
tika-s0305t0:487_0: Sodhessāmīti jambudīpe kenaci tepiṭakena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ piṭakattayameva mayhaṃ uggahaparipucchāvasena sodheyyāmīti paratīraṃ jambudīpaṃ gato.
tika-s0305t0:487_2: Aniccānupassanādīsu ekamukhena abhiniviṭṭhenapi abhidhammapariyāyena tīhi eva vimokkhehi maggaṃ labhatīti
tika-s0305t0:487_4: tathā tayo appaṇihitato vuṭṭhitāti cha honti,
tika-s0305t0:487_7: tayo antarāparinibbāyino eko upahaccaparinibbāyī eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca,
tika-s0305t0:487_8: te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyibhedena dasāti avihādīsu catūsupi cattālīsa,
tika-s0305t0:487_9: akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto natthīti aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino.
tika-s0305t0:489_2: evaṃ taṃdvārikadhammesupi adhipateyyaṃ tehi anuvattanīyattāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0305t0:495_4: Sādanīyaṭṭhena dhammapadāni attani assādayatīti sātaṃ, madhuraṃ.
tika-s0305t0:497_2: Kiñci dvayaṃ saṅghaṭṭitamattaṃ hutvā na samodhānagataṃ hotīti taṃnivattanatthaṃ “saṅghaṭṭanasamodhānā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:497_4: Adharāraṇī viya vatthārammaṇaṃ asatipi vāyāme tajjasamphassapaccayato.
tika-s0305t0:497_6: Saṅghaṭṭo viya phassasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ araṇidvayasaṅghaṭṭanā viya phassasseva vatthārammaṇesu saṅghaṭṭanākārena pavattito.
tika-s0305t0:497_8: Vatthārammaṇaṃ vā uttarāraṇī viya indhanāpātagahaṇādīsu ussāhassa viya pavattisambhavato.
tika-s0305t0:499_7: Adesitattāti sesasuttāni viya “sukhindriya”ntiādinā adesitattā idaṃ uppaṭipāṭikasuttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0305t0:501_1: Dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ upacārakkhaṇe eva nirujjhantīti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0305t0:501_12: Pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:501_18: “Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilami,
tika-s0305t0:501_19: cittampi vihaññī”ti ca vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayatā veditabbā.
tika-s0305t0:501_21: Tatthassa siyā uppattīti tattha dutiyajjhānupacāre assa domanassassa uppatti bhaveyya.
tika-s0305t0:501_22: “Tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa suppahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:501_23: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “na tveva dutiyajjhāne pahīnapaccayattā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:501_24: Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya na dūreti katvā “āsannattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:501_25: Nānāvajjanupacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyyāti imamatthaṃ dassento “appanāppattāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:501_26: “Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva pavattanti,
tika-s0305t0:501_27: evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0305t0:502_1: Sā panassa uppādanena vā uppannassa samāpajjanena vā hotīti vuttaṃ “uppādanatthāya samāpajjanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:506_4: Kiṃ pana bhagavato vajirasāraṃ sarīraṃ otāpetabbaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0305t0:506_7: Na sakkoti byāmappabhāya kāyaci pabhāya anabhibhavanīyattā.
tika-s0305t0:506_9: ghammasabhāvatāya pana rasmīnaṃ parito pharantī sūriyābhā tikhiṇā uṇhāti āha “rasmiteja”nti.
tika-s0305t0:506_10: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yatheva hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:507_0: Suvaṇṇāvaṭṭaṃ viyāti acche suvaṇṇapatte vinivattaāvaṭṭaṃ viya.
tika-s0305t0:507_5: Evarūpaṃ na hotīti aññesaṃ pākatikasattānaṃ vuttākāraṃ viya na hoti puññasambhārassa uḷāratamattā vipaccanassa pariyantagatattā.
tika-s0305t0:507_10: Purato vaṅkoti thokaṃ purato natamattaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0305t0:509_3: Idāni taṃ aññavisayataṃ anvayato byatirekato vibhāvetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:510_1: Indriyaviññāṇāni hi asatipi tādise adhippāye attano ārammaṇassa yāthāvato sampajānanato pavedanavijānanāni karontāni viya pavattanti,
tika-s0305t0:510_5: manova nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti manodvārikajavanamano hi savisesaṃ manovisayaṃ paccanubhoti,
tika-s0305t0:512_1: Bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa hi javanamano ussakkitvāva maggasatiṃ paṭisarati tappariyosānattā.
tika-s0305t0:512_6: Ārammaṇavasena natthi etassa paṭisaraṇanti appaṭisaraṇaṃ asaṅkhatāmatassa santiniccasabhāvattā.
tika-s0305t0:512_10: Na tato paraṃ gacchati gatassa aññassa tādisassa abhāvā.
tika-s0305t0:513_3: Maggo daḷhāya asaṃhāriyasaddhāya mūlaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttāni ceva vicikicchācittañcāti pañca akusalacittāni samucchedavasena pahīnāni.
tika-s0305t0:513_4: Pañca nīvaraṇānīti ettha apāyagamanīyāni paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnāni,
tika-s0305t0:513_5: itarāni vikkhambhanavasena jhānena pahīnānīti pañcasu orambhāgiyakilesasaṃyojanesu ekadesavigameneva
tika-s0305t0:515_1: Pubbakoṭṭhake evaṃ āgatasuttaṃ ādiṃ katvā phalindriyāneva kathitāni aggaphalavasena desanāya āgatattā.
tika-s0305t0:517_1: Upari saha vipassanāya tayo maggāti vipassanāya saha sotāpattiphalato upari tayo maggā.
tika-s0305t0:517_2: Maggādhigamena idāni paccakkhabhūtattā “ime kho te dhammā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0305t0:517_4: tassa vasena dassetuṃ “arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ indriyabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t0:523_1: Cattāri indriyānīti paññindriyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni cattāri.
tika-s0305t0:523_3: saddo pana yathā tathā visuddhepi hotīti tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tampi panā”tiādi.
tika-s0305t0:523_5: evaṃ paññindriyampi missakanti vuccamāne na koci virodhoti adhippāyenāha “tampi pana…pe…
tika-s0305t0:525_4: Na hi ariyāpi anadhigataṃ maggaphalaṃ paccavekkhituṃ sakkonti.
tika-s0305t0:529_3: Bhāvanapuṃsakanti bhāvajotakaṃ napuṃsakavacanaṃ yathā “visamaṃ vātā vāyanti,
tika-s0305t0:532_10: “Dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phala”nti evaṃ atītasutte vuttāni heṭṭhā dve phalāni nāmāti vadanti.
tika-s0305t0:532_11: Yehi pana indriyehi aññatra pana antarāparinibbāyiṃ sesāni phalāni honti,
tika-s0305t0:532_12: tāni cattāri sapubbabhāgāni lokuttarānīti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0305t0:537_1: Chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhīti kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi chandhasamādhi.
tika-s0305t0:537_5: ijjhanti etāya saddhā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena “iddhī”ti saṅkhātānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
tika-s0305t0:537_8: Sā eva ca yathāvuttaiddhi yasmā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā uparimāya uparimāya pādabhūtā,
tika-s0305t0:537_11: Tattha hi vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0305t0:539_0: 817. Iddhipadesanti iddhiyā ekadesaṃ. Ko pana soti āha – “tayo ca magge tīṇi ca phalānī”ti.
tika-s0305t0:541_1: Samattanti sāmaññassa samaṃ attanaṃ ijjhanaṃ samattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:541_2: Vivaṭṭapādakā eva iddhipādā kathitā “apārā pāraṃ gamanāya saṃvattantī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0305t0:543_1: Udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa devāyatanasaṅkhepena iṭṭhakāhi kate mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne.
tika-s0305t0:543_7: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇavasena aparāparaṃ pavattitā ānītā.
tika-s0305t0:543_8: Yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattimarahati,
tika-s0305t0:543_11: Vatthu viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisesānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā.
tika-s0305t0:543_15: Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya sikhappattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.
tika-s0305t0:544_3: Tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:544_4: Mahāsīvatthero pana mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkheyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ
tika-s0305t0:544_5: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva
tika-s0305t0:545_0: Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhisuyyatīti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto,
tika-s0305t0:545_1: evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti.
tika-s0305t0:545_3: kvacani patito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:546_0: Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0305t0:546_2: So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti.
tika-s0305t0:546_4: ariyehi vā añño yo koci paro puthujjano.
tika-s0305t0:546_5: Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0305t0:546_6: evaṃ thero bhagavatā kataṃ nimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:546_12: Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā,
tika-s0305t0:547_1: aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā,
tika-s0305t0:547_4: Nanu esa aggasāvakassa mahiddhikassa mahānubhāvassa kucchiṃ paviṭṭhoti?
tika-s0305t0:547_8: Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhikatattā.
tika-s0305t0:547_9: Nimittobhāsanti ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya “yassa kassaci, ānanda,
tika-s0305t0:547_10: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ nimittaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:547_11: Tathā pana pariyāyaggahaṇaṃ muñcitvā ujukaṃyeva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso.
tika-s0305t0:547_13: Attano aparādhahetuko sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti,
tika-s0305t0:547_16: Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti?
tika-s0305t0:548_1: virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:548_5: Sattānaṃ anatthāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ na muñcatīti namuci.
tika-s0305t0:548_8: Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti,
tika-s0305t0:548_9: na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato.
tika-s0305t0:548_10: Sattamasattāhassa hi parato ajapālanigrodhamūle brahmuno sakkassa ca paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0305t0:548_11: ñatvā “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ atikkāmessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā ṭhito cintesi,
tika-s0305t0:548_14: mama manoratho ijjhissatī”ti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito –
tika-s0305t0:548_19: Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0305t0:549_1: Tatheva vinītāti maggavasena kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā.
tika-s0305t0:549_2: Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane vesārajjappattiyā visāradā,
tika-s0305t0:549_3: sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho.
tika-s0305t0:549_4: Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0305t0:549_10: Tadevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena sutanti vuttaṃ, tameva.
tika-s0305t0:549_12: Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti.
tika-s0305t0:549_13: Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhavasenapi taṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:549_26: Attano ācariyavādanti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:550_10: Uttānīkarissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti.
tika-s0305t0:550_12: saddo kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0305t0:551_2: evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti.
tika-s0305t0:551_5: Ettha ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni,
tika-s0305t0:551_6: ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni.
tika-s0305t0:551_7: Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0305t0:553_0: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito,
tika-s0305t0:553_2: etassa avahanatthaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0305t0:553_4: yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sabhāvādito sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi satiṃ yathātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t0:553_5: Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti yasmā imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ bodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:553_9: evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā saccabhāgena vinicchayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0305t0:553_10: Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajīti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ na samāpajjissāmīti vissaji,
tika-s0305t0:553_11: taṃ vissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkharīyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ na pavattayissāmīti vissaji.
tika-s0305t0:554_3: sā pana jātikhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva,
tika-s0305t0:554_6: tadāpi tattakāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ?
tika-s0305t0:554_9: Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tattakameva jātikhettaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0305t0:554_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dasasahassī lokadhātu nissaddā hoti nirākulā…pe…
tika-s0305t0:554_17: na cettha kāci bherī devadundubhīti adhippetā,
tika-s0305t0:554_18: atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsato nigghosasaddo.
tika-s0305t0:554_21: Tassa hi tadā acchabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā.
tika-s0305t0:555_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ ciratarakālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0305t0:555_1: dāni na cirasseva nikkhipissāmī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udāneti,
tika-s0305t0:555_2: evaṃ udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:556_3: Tathā hi taṃ paṭipakkhena parito khaṇḍitabhāvena parittanti vuccati.
tika-s0305t0:556_4: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:556_5: Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato “mahaggataṃ atula”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:556_6: tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato āruppassa sātisayaṃ vijjantīti arūpāvacaraṃ atulanti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:556_8: Appavipākanti tīsupi kammesu yaṃ appavipākaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-s0305t0:556_13: taṃ hīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsu bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:556_14: Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0305t0:556_16: Niyakajjhattaratoti sasantānadhammesu vipassanāvasena gocarāsevanāya ca rato.
tika-s0305t0:556_18: na ca taṃ kāmādi^ bhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ sambhavanti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0305t0:556_20: Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ
tika-s0305t0:557_4: Tulento tīrentotiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”tiādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa avasajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:557_5: Evantiādinā pana udānagāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.
tika-s0305t0:561_1: Parato imasmiṃ pāsādakampanavagge dasamasutte āvi bhavissanti.
tika-s0305t0:561_4: tathā dutiyatatiyasuttesupi ca chaabhiññāpādakā iddhipādā kathitāti attho.
tika-s0305t0:563_4: na vinā taṃ chandaṃ nissāyāti āha –
tika-s0305t0:563_12: ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī”ti imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipati samādhi chandasamādhīti adhipatisaddalopaṃ katvā samāso vuttoti viññāyati,
tika-s0305t0:563_15: Tena “chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi padhānabhūtasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgatā”ti vakkhati,
tika-s0305t0:563_20: Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro,
tika-s0305t0:563_23: Yathā chando chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato,
tika-s0305t0:563_24: evaṃ chandasamādhi chandena ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato.
tika-s0305t0:563_25: Padhānasaṅkhārāpi chandena ceva chandasamādhinā ca samannāgatāti tīsupi padesu samannāgatasaddo yojetabbo.
tika-s0305t0:563_27: tasmā sabbe te dhammā ekato katvā “ayaṃ vuccati…pe…
tika-s0305t0:563_30: vibhaṅge pana tesaṃ iddhibhāvo sampayuttānaṃ iddhipādabhāvo vuttoti dassento “iddhipādavibhaṅge panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0305t0:564_1: Tattha chandañhi bhāvayato padhānaṃ katvā bhāventassa tathā pavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena ijjhamāno chando iddhi nāma,
tika-s0305t0:565_6: Dveyeva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi padhānasaṅkhāro ca,
